name: PlateletCountLabTestCapillaryNumberPerVolume
title: Platelet Count Lab Test Capillary Number Per Volume
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains lab tests commonly used for a capillary platelet count test.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a capillary platelet count lab test performed. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to Laboratory Test, Result or Laboratory Test, Order datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Platelet count lab test using the source of capillary blood.),(Exclusion Criteria: Platelet count lab tests using the source of blood/serum/plasma blood.)

concept.display: Platelets [#/volume] in Capillary blood by Manual count
